definitions: a six-point score made by carrying or passing the ball into the end zone of the opposing side, or by recovering it there following a fumble or blocked kick
shortDefinitions: six-point score made by carrying or passing ball into end zone of opposing side

definitions: an act of touching the ground with the ball behind the opponents' goal line, scoring a try.
shortDefinitions: act of touching ground with ball behind opponents' goal line

definitions: the moment at which an aircraft's wheels or part of a spacecraft make contact with the ground during landing
shortDefinitions: moment at which aircraft's wheels or part of spacecraft make contact with ground during landing

definitions: an instance of a tornado making contact with the ground

examples.text: severe storms spawned multiple tornado touchdowns on Wednesday night

shortDefinitions: instance of tornado making contact with ground
